root.name: Mayhem Intergalactic
root.description: GameplayEasy to learn space exploration game with skirmish and multiplayer options. Contains both generated and hand-crafted maps to play.PC System RequirementsOperating system: Windows® 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1 GHz or fasterMemory: 256 MBHard disk space: 40 MB freeVideo: NVIDIA® or ATI® graphics card recommendedSound: On-board or better recommended
